channel.title: Exp rate

item.title: Exp rate
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Sparta I Am Sparta
item.description:
@I_Am_Sparta wrote:

Basically I have in the character files. SO its already done in play.java and playersave.java
I have 4 modes:
easyMode
mediumMode
hardMode
extremeMode

And if they are set to true, I want the the exp rate to change for example
easyMode = 5000 exp rate
mediumMode = 500 exp rate
hardMode = 50 exp rate
extremeMode = 10 exp rate

Here is the code I have:

public static int GET_MELEE_EXP_RATE() { if (Player.easyMode) return 5000; else if (Player.mediumMode) return 500; else if(Player.hardMode) return 50; else if (Player.extremeMode) return 10; return 1000; } public static int GET_RANGE_EXP_RATE() { if (Player.easyMode) return 5000; else if (Player.mediumMode) return 500; else if(Player.hardMode) return 50; else if (Player.extremeMode) return 10; return 1000; } public static int GET_MAGIC_EXP_RATE() { if (Player.easyMode) return 5000; else if (Player.mediumMode) return 500; else if(Player.hardMode) return 50; else if (Player.extremeMode) return 10; return 1000; }

But the exp doesnâ€™t change at all. Help please?

Read full topic
